      Sends game start update to clients in a match.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the ID of the match
      resource - the resource cards on the public board
      gold - the gold cards on the public board
      quest - the quest cards on the public board
      boards - the player boards

    • reJoinMatchUpdate

      public void reJoinMatchUpdate(String nickname, PlayerInitialSetting playerInitialSetting, GameState gameState, PlaceInPublicBoard<ResourceCard> resource, PlaceInPublicBoard<GoldCard> gold, PlaceInPublicBoard<QuestCard> quest, Map<String,Board> boards, PlayerHand playerHand)
      Sends rejoin match update to a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      playerInitialSetting - the initial settings of the player
      gameState - the current game state
      resource - the resource cards on the public board
      gold - the gold cards on the public board
      quest - the quest cards on the public board
      boards - the player boards
      playerHand - the player's hand
